segments.text: I'm going to buy a CD .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not listen to music online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I will have to pay quite a lot to listen to music on line , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can audition music on line , and you can audition it off line after downloading it , so you needn't pay for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have downloaded one , but it still can't be listened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In order to listen to music , you must have the necessary software .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you recommend some to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you need install it after downloading so that you can use it .
segments.speaker: S1
